body.name: Madesmart Classic 5-Slot Small Knife Holder Storage Mat for Drawers, Soft-Grip, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 6 mins
features: 5-SLOT KNIFE HOLDER: Easily fits in most kitchen drawers to offer a practical solution for storing and organizing kitchen knives, keeping them easy to view and access
KEEPS KNIVES SAFE AND SHARP: Designed with 5 spaces that allow you to separate small sized knives while ensuring they stay sharp and safe in storage
ERGONOMIC NONSLIP BASE: Features a nonslip, soft-grip base to keep your knives neatly in place and prevent them from sliding as you open and close the drawer
HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made from durable BPA-free materials to withstand heavy-duty use and provide years of quality kitchen organization
IDEAL SIZE FOR DRAWERS: Measures 15.13" x 4.19" x 2.13" to offer plenty of space for your smaller knives and fit perfectly in drawers
body.description: Maximize the space in your kitchen with the Madesmart Classic Small Knife Mat. Simple and convenient, this knife holder easily fits in most kitchen drawers to offer a practical solution for storing and organizing kitchen knives, keeping them easy to view and access. It's designed with 5 generous slots that allow you to separate small sized knives while ensuring they stay sharp and safe in storage. The ergonomic nonslip, soft-grip base keeps your knives neatly in place and prevents them from sliding as you open and close the drawer. Made from durable BPA-free materials, the knife organizer withstands heavy-duty use to provide years of quality kitchen organization. The knife mat measures 15.13" x 4.19" x 2.13" to offer plenty of space for your smaller knives and fit perfectly in drawers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us We are a Minnesota based, Women Owned housewares design company. Starting with the original Junk Drawer organizer in 1990, we continue to revolutionize home organization with premium product collections that are enjoyed in every home MISSION We strive to elevate the home organization experience through thoughtful design innovation. With our commitment to meaningful partnerships, we are driven to create premium quality products that invoke beauty through function Our team of enthusiastic, talented individuals are collectively impassioned to go above and beyond the expectations in everything we do. Whether we’re working together to create innovative new designs, proofing each other's emails before pressing the send button, supervising our highly-skilled manufacturing team, managing our shipping and fulfillment relationships, or ultimately helping our customers get organized, we are passionate about every step. We are a community that is proud of who we are and what we do every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, great for organization!
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality knife holder that helps with drawer organization in the kitchen. The materials are easy to clean and it holds small to large knifes with no issue. I would definitely buy this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t take up space
reviews.reviewText: We have minimal space, so this knife holder is great. Fits easily in dwr & keeps knives organized. May not work well if it’s full of knives & you have fat fingers :) but I think it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The knives are secure in the drawer and now I don’t worry about accidentally cutting myself. And, this can easily be cleaned. I love organized kitchen drawers and this is a must.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps Keep Knives Sharp (and fingertips intact)
reviews.reviewText: Had been keeping good knives loose in a drawer, and mostly dull as a consequence. Like this because it visually organizes the blades and can be cleaned if needed, unlike a block.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lays in the drawer perfectly and holds several large knives!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well with the large silverware holder I purchased.I bought two and ended up only needing the one due to the size of the silverware tray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect replacement for on-the-counter knife holder
reviews.reviewText: I was not enthused about having my knives setting out on the countertop, in their holder, as I noticed dust, etc. collected there. I do want my knives CLEAN!! I am delighted with this drawer -located knife holder mat. I have even discovered I can park my kitchen scissors in this holder. There is plenty of room for my eight knives and two pairs of scissors, with four of the knives being large ones...a perfect solution for keeping my knives and scissors clean and off the countertop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Knife Organizer
reviews.reviewText: This works perfectly in my kitchen drawer to keep my larger knives organized. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: So good I bought a second one!
reviews.reviewText: This drawer saver is just what I’d hoped for. Silicone, well made, allows sharp knives to be held safely in slots so as not to cut your hands. Fits into drawers perfectly. Slots are big enough to put two knives in one (we have a lot of knives). Can’t go wrong. Highly recommend this knife organizer and knife protector
Buen producto y muy práctico cuando hay muchos trastes limpios
It fits the knifes well in a pull out shelf.
O matéria parece bom. Usá-lo parece simples e intuitivo
